laboratory_examinations.findings: Patient 1: 170/105 mm Hg; Patient 2: 155/110 mm Hg.
Patient 1: normal (7.9 mmol/liter); Patient 2: normal (11.1 mmol/liter).
Patient 1: normal (69.0 µmol/liter); Patient 2: normal (86.6 µmol/liter).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Patient 1: 2.15 nmol/liter; Patient 2: 2.98 nmol/liter. Both are low compared to normal range.
Patient 1: low levels, inappropriate response to ACTH; Patient 2: low levels, inappropriate response to ACTH.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated levels of corticosterone metabolites; low or undetectable levels of androstenedione and other steroids.
